5th European TA
Conference
20-23 March 2022!

Join us for the next European TA conference in Karlsruhe, Germany to discuss "Digital Future(s): TA in and for a changing World". The globalTA Network will be an active part of the conference with sessions, networking and the introduction of the new book "Technology Assessment and Global Technology Governance" For more infos on the conference go to: https://karlsruhe2022.technology-assessment.info/
